channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Florence + The Machine @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:30 — Florence + The Machine at Chase Center. Florence + The Machine is known for their powerful live performances and emotional depth, making this tour highly anticipated.

item.title: Lily Allen @ The Masonic
item.description: 2026-04-29 03:00 — Lily Allen at The Masonic. Lily Allen's unique blend of pop and storytelling makes her West End Girl performance an intriguing event.

item.title: Meghan Trainor @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-08-09 01:30 — Meghan Trainor at Chase Center. Meghan Trainor's latest tour promises a fun pop experience with her catchy hits and engaging stage presence.

item.title: RUSH @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-10-16 02:30 → 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's Fifty Something tour is a nostalgic trip for fans of classic rock, showcasing their legendary status.

item.title: Jack Johnson @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back style and connection to nature resonate well with fans, making his tour appealing.

item.title: Rainbow Kitten Surprise @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-19 03:00 — Rainbow Kitten Surprise at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Rainbow Kitten Surprise's unique sound and energetic performances make them a standout act on this tour.

item.title: Three Days Grace @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Three Days Grace's Alienation Tour promises to deliver their signature rock sound to fans.

item.title: Bob Moses @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Bob Moses' blend of electronic and live music creates a captivating experience for concertgoers.

item.title: Train @ Shoreline Amphitheatre
item.description: 2026-08-27 01:45 — Train at Shoreline Amphitheatre. TRAIN's 25th anniversary tour celebrates their classic hits, appealing to long-time fans.

item.title: The Neighbourhood @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-10-08 02:30 — The Neighbourhood at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. The Neighbourhood's upcoming tour is highly anticipated, given their strong fanbase and engaging music.

item.title: Seven Lions @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-05-31 02:30 — Seven Lions at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Evanescence's tour featuring Spiritbox and Nova Twins promises a powerful night of rock music.

item.title: Levity @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-05-10 02:30 — Levity at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Lewis Capaldi's emotional ballads and strong stage presence make his show a highly anticipated event.

item.title: Joyce Manor @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:00 — Joyce Manor at The Fillmore. Joyce Manor's punk-infused sound and energetic performances make them a must-see for fans of the genre.

item.title: St. Lucia @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-05-18 03:00 — St. Lucia at August Hall. St. Lucia's vibrant sound and engaging live shows make them a great addition to the lineup.

item.title: The New Pornographers @ The Castro Theatre
item.description: 2026-05-12 03:00 — The New Pornographers at The Castro Theatre. The New Pornographers' unique sound and strong live reputation make their show an exciting prospect.

item.title: Olivia Dean @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-07-12 03:00 — Olivia Dean at Chase Center. Olivia Dean's rising star status and engaging performances make her shows a must-see.
